name: search_files_contents_contain_keyword
description: Search for files in a directory that contain a specific keyword, optionally filtering by file extension and file size.

directory.description: The directory to search in. Default to './'

file_extension.description: The file extension to filter by (e.g., '.txt'). Defaults to None (all files).

max_size_mb.description: The maximum file size in MB to search. Defaults to 1 MB.
